bibl.title: Late Roman Amethyst and Gold Mining at Wadi el-Hudi. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The gold mines and miners' settlements at Wadi el-Hudi [south of Aswan] (sites 1-4 and 13-14). - The miners' well (site 8). - The late Roman amethyst mine and settlement (sites 11-12). - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Egyptian Stories. A British Egyptological Tribute to Alan B. Lloyd on the Occasion of his Retirement.

bibl.seg: SHAW I., Late Roman Amethyst and Gold Mining at Wadi el-Hudi. Avec résumé en anglais.

Thomas SCHNEIDER and Kasia SZPAKOWSKA (Edd.), Egyptian Stories. A British Egyptological Tribute to Alan B. Lloyd on the Occasion of his Retirement = Alter Orient und Altes Testament. 347 (Münster, 2007) pp. 319-328, 7 figg.

Introduction. - The gold mines and miners' settlements at Wadi el-Hudi [south of Aswan] (sites 1-4 and 13-14). - The miners' well (site 8). - The late Roman amethyst mine and settlement (sites 11-12). - Conclusions.
